content.query:
CREATE TABLE fairy_tail_qa_1 (
    story_name VARCHAR(200),
    story_section VARCHAR(8000),
    question VARCHAR(8000),
    answerl VARCHAR(8000),
    answer2 VARCHAR(8000),
    local_or_sum VARCHAR(100),
    attribute VARCHAR(20),
    ex_or_m VARCHAR(8),
    ex_or_im2 VARCHAR(8)
)
WITH(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
)

ALTER TABLE fairy_tail_qa_1 
ALTER COLUMN local_or_sum VARCHAR(12);

COPY INTO fairy_tail_qa_1
FROM 'https://practicestoragemilgard.blob.core.windows.net/training/raw/fairy_tail_qa/train.csv'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE='CSV'
)

SELECT DISTINCT local_or_sum FROM fairy_tail_qa_1
